ValidationRule.description: "Core Concepts" is required to mark as complete.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (
OR (RecordType.DeveloperName = 'OPE_Activity', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Short_Course', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Single_Product' ),
ISPICKVAL( ProductRequestID__r.Product_Request_Status__c , 'Design'), AND( NOT (ISCHANGED( Design_Form_Status__c ) ), OR( ISPICKVAL( Design_Form_Status__c , 'Design Form Sent'), ISPICKVAL( Design_Form_Status__c , 'Design Form Received') ) ), LEN( Core_Concepts__c )=0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Core Concepts" is required to mark as complete.
